page.title: 04THE RAILWAY STATION
page.content: I interviewed a man who lived by the pier.He said that the pier was once a wooden one and that it once belonged to the{Great Western Railway.}It now belongs to the port of Bristol.Before the power station was built a flour mill was on the site.The pier-masters house used to be a railway station. The power station is due to be knocked down.The man showed us where the stop-blocks were at the end of the line. He thought that the land left by the power station may be used for housing. BEN SANSUM
